name: Gun Pals
description:
Two Gun Pals out in a adventure trying to survive a post - apocaliptic world!

 

● CONTROLS  ●

Keyboard

Gamepad

●  KNOWN BUGS & DETAILS ●

- If you fall while grabbing,  you can get stuck on walls crashing the game -

-  Not well explained, but to RELOAD AMMO you need to grab the box -

- Might not be very obvious, but to leave title screen,  press any key -

- Not well explained, but SPAWNING the box costs energy -

●

Made by Roland M & Jesse M

~ A game made in 48 hrs for the first GMTK Jam ~
